title: Social Media Feed System
text: Efficient real-time notification feed management system for Twitter.
cta: : Lightning speed time update and access during high volume data management per second. Effective data Sharding and caching technique implementation.

title: Designing of Booking System for Hotel Rooms
text: User reservation and room management focused booking management systems for business.
cta: Infusion of a normalized database schema for tracking room bookings, customer accounts, concurrent bookings, and cancellations.

title: Food Ordering System
text: Build a platform connecting users to local restaurants for ordering and delivery.
cta: Design a microservices architecture for managing restaurant listings, orders, and payments, with real-time tracking and user reviews.

title: Netflix Content Streaming Service
text: Design a microservices-based architecture for Netflixâ€™s streaming service, focusing on service decomposition.
cta: Use CAP principles to manage data consistency, availability, and partition tolerance for real-time streaming with resilience.

title: End-to-end Design of Flipkart-like Shopping Cart
text: High-quality user interaction, rich shopping cart system creation from scratch. Includes common features like add, replace, and delete items. The design focus remains on user experience and scalability.
cta: Normalization of database schema, Sequence diagrams, UML diagrams, and class.

title: Developing Property Booking System
text: Create a booking management system for hotels that supports user reservations and room management.
cta: Implement a normalized database schema for hotels, rooms, bookings, and user accounts, ensuring the system can handle concurrent bookings and cancellations efficiently.
